usr_func package¶

Submodules¶

usr_func.is_even module¶

This function tests if a given integer is even or not.

usr_func.is_even.is_even(value: int) → bool¶

Checks if a given integer even or not.

Parameters

value – integer value

Returns: True if it is even, False or else.

usr_func.is_list_empty module¶

This function tests if a given list is empty or not.

usr_func.is_list_empty.is_list_empty(glist)¶

Tests if a given list is empty or not.

Parameters

glist – can be nested list such as [], [[]], [[[]]] etc.

Returns: True if it is empty, such as [], [[]], [[[]]], etc.

usr_func.sort_polygon_vertices module¶

This function sorts the polygon with the counter-clockwise direction.

usr_func.sort_polygon_vertices.sort_polygon_vertices(polygon: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray¶

Sort the polygon counter-clockwisely.

Args: vertices of the polygon is not organised in order.
polygon: np.array([[x1, y1, z1],

[x2, y2, z2], … [xn, yn, zn]])

Returns: sorted polygon with the direction of counter-clockwise.
